publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-990 Mr Duncan McNeil: Ofgem Scottish Office-That the Parliament welcomes Ofgem's recent announcement that the Ofgem office in Scotland is central to its efforts to protect the interests of Scottish gas and electricity consumers and calls on Ofgem to work with the Scottish Executive to ensure that Scotland's targets for renewable energy, energy efficiency and fuel poverty can be met at the earliest opportunity and at the lowest cost to consumers.

S2M-990 Mr Duncan McNeil: Ofgem Scottish Office-That the Parliament welcomes Ofgem's recent announcement that the Ofgem office in Scotland is central to its efforts to protect the interests of Scottish gas and electricity consumers and calls on Ofgem to work with the Scottish Executive to ensure that Scotland's targets for renewable energy, energy efficiency and fuel poverty can be met at the earliest opportunity and at the lowest cost to consumers.
S2M-990 Ofgem Scottish Office (lodged on 3 March 2004) Pauline McNeill*, Helen Eadie*, Michael McMahon*
S2M-990 Ofgem Scottish Office (lodged on 3 March 2004) Jackie Baillie*
S2M-990 Ofgem Scottish Office (lodged on 3 March 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-990 Ofgem Scottish Office (lodged on 3 March 2004) Karen Gillon*
S2M-990 Ofgem Scottish Office (lodged on 3 March 2004) Elaine Smith*
